Grocery App Development Services

In today’s fast-growing world, People have no time for shopping their daily basics. They prefer to use online grocery apps to get their groceries at the doorstep. It saves time and makes more convenient for users to order anytime. M-commerce leads the huge crowd to its court and made the users installed the various app for purchasing the items. Out of these highly used apps, grocery apps are installed in the higher number by users nowadays. Grocery shopping app development has given us a new way of buying groceries while sitting at home.

We haul your grocery business online with our demanding grocery mobile app development service.

The NineHertz has worked on customized grocery store app development from the last many years. This leads a revolutionary way to buy groceries online and make the work go easy. Our grocery app developers design the user-engaging interface and develop robust, straight-forward and easy to use app. Our grocery app solutions help you to take your grocery business to the next level of online selling. Double up your revenue with the best grocery mobile app by our dedicated developers.

The best quality and on-time delivery have made us the leading grocery mobile app development company. Get your quote for the grocery app solution with our experts soon!

Why Choose The NineHertz For Your Grocery Shopping App Development?

Experience Team

Confidential Details

Apart from the above qualities, choose us as the best grocery delivery app development company. We offer a readymade solution of grocery app such clone of big basket and grofers, these solution saves your time and reduce the cost of development.

Along with these, we create grocery solution from scratch according to the client’s requirements. Our grocery app developers have mastered in the online grocery delivery app creation and embed advanced features which are best for the Android and iOS platform.

Types of Grocery Mobile Apps

E-commerce Grocery App

We create an app like grofers which are a great way to buy the grocery. Select the slot according to your time and let your grocery delivered when you are at home. How about we track our groceries? Get the live tracking option for your grocery.

In-store Grocery App

The image of the grocery store is visible where products are displayed. One can see the products with the specifications. This gives the virtual tour of the stores and gives the basic idea about the quality of the available products. These stores also avail the offers and discount, location of the store when users are around.

Personalized Grocery App

These grocery apps make the shopping experience on the next level. Users can create the grocery list and share with the store. In this way, users get the desired product online with a simple grocery application.

Grocery Marketplaces: Shopping Mobile App Model

Aggregators apps

In these kinds of stores, the user gets a list of the nearby grocery stores from which users select one and choose the product from the list of the chosen store. Once products (vegetables, nutrition supplements, etc) are added to the cart and payment is processed, the user gets the confirmation notification. The delivery of the grocery is taken care of by the store owner and the user can easily track the order status.

The single platform of such app makes you connect with multiple stores nearby you.

Grocery Marketplaces
Grocery Chains

Grocery Chains Apps

The owner of the store owns the application and gets the app developed on his own. Overall management of the products such as updating, adding, removing and other inventory operations are taken care of by him. The offers and discounts are also part of his handling as he is the admin of the app and hence the entire management, from customers to products, is done under his supervision.

User can only purchase online with a single store and can track the delivery of the same store.

Single vendor store app

The app has multiple vendors selling their products on a single platform. There’s a common list of products from which the user selects the items and add them to the cart. When the payment is done, a delivery agent is assigned to the user. The delivery agent is picked up based on the nearest location to the user. User can track the order and know the status.

The offers on each item vary on the product to product.

Single Grocery Stores
